'''''Mythlore'' 85''' ([https://dc.swosu.edu/mythlore/vol22/iss3/ Volume 22, Issue 3]) is an issue of the ''[[Mythlore]]'' journal, published by the [[Mythopoeic Society]].

==Contents==

====Articles====

*Flieger, Verlyn. "Fantasy and Reality: J.R.R. Tolkien's World and the Fairy-Story Essay."
*Christopher, Joe R. "Three Views of Faerie in C.S. Lewis's 'The Queen of Drum'."
*Hammond, Wayne G., and Christina Scull. "J.R.R. Tolkien: The Achievement of His Literary Life."
*Versinger, Georgette. "The Commonplace Book: Charles Williams's Early Approach to the Arthurian Poetry."
*Farrell, Eleanor M. "King Arthur 'Lite': Dilution of Mythic Elements in Arthurian Film."
*Khoddam, Salwa. "Balder the Beautiful: Aslan's Norse Ancestor in ''The Chronicles of Narnia''."

====Features====

*Sherman, Theodore James. Editorial.
*Hammond, Wayne G. Inklings Bibliography.
